Welcome to the Calculator App!

This app is designed to make calculations easy and efficient. Key features include:

- Basic & Advanced Operations: Perform a variety of mathematical calculations.
- History Page: View and manage your previous calculations.
- Light & Dark Themes: Choose between light and dark modes for a comfortable experience.

Developed by: Sohan Beniwal
LinkedIn: Sohan Beniwal

Thank you for using the Calculator App!
